title: Stock Funds Slumped to Start 2022
sub_head: The average fund dropped 6.7% in January. Also: The Super Bowl Predictor of the market says to root for the Rams.
body:
It hasnâ€™t been a happy new year so far for fund investors.
The average diversified U.S.-stock fund declined 6.7% in January, coming off a pandemic-defying 22.5% rally for all of 2021, according to Refinitiv Lipper data.
